name: k6
description: This feature installs the k6 CLI tool, which can be used to run load tests defined in JavaScript files.

with.description: Comma separated list of extensions to include in the custom k6 build.

xk6-version.description: The xk6 version to use for a custom k6 build.

go-version.description: Go version to use for custom k6 builds. Only used if 'with' is set.
